Sorry all, it's early here ( i need more coffee ) I will try that again

Thanks Tom and Moses. I was quoting more in part from what I had been taught, ( I guess there is a lot of different information out there ) I was also reading recently in a Tsuba book ( I think ) about the same theory, Thinner light tsuba were in vogue when the sword was used from the horse as apposed to the two handed technique on the ground. I will see if I can dig that information up again.

Thanks guy's for correcting me. :-) 

ever learning

Rich
